title: The Softer Side of Value Investing - Ep 134
itunes:title: The Softer Side of Value Investing - Ep 134
description:
Culture matters. In this podcast, Vitaliy shares how he evolved from an analyst purely focused on numbers to an investor and CEO focused on people. Using two stories from IMA's own past, Vitaliy recounts how running the business made him a better investor.

You can read this article online here: https://contrarianedge.com/the-softer-side-of-value-investing/

Disclosure: Read this before you buy your next stock
